title: Publishing a Crate to Crates.io
description: In this lab, we will discuss how to publish a crate to crates.io, the crate registry that distributes open source code, making it easier for people to find and use your package.

meta.title: Publishing a Crate to Crates.io
meta.description: Learn how to publish your Rust crate to Crates.io, the official package registry, and make your code accessible to the wider Rust community.
meta.keywords: rust playground, crates io, documentation, package publishing, rust tutor, rust online compiler, rust online, rust commands, rust practice, open source
